title: ANP leaders call on prime minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 21 (APP): A delegation of the Awami National Party including National Assembly member Amir Haider Khan Hoti and senior party leader Aimal Wali Khan Thursday called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif here.
Federal Minister for Railways Khawaja Saad Rafiq and ANP leader Haji Ghulam Ahmed Bilour also attended the meeting.
The delegation members congratulated the prime minister on assumption of the office and also discussed the overall political situation in the country.
